author: _shemnon
content: Re VB's call fro 32 byte addresses - https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/745077610685661265/1146969399954247760 - I see two valid ways to handle large addresses while nothing can exist at a large address.  (a) return an empty account (empty code, zero balance, empty data) or (b) exceptional halt when asking for a large address.

author: _shemnon
content: (a) follows current behavior closely.  But this is the opportunity to examine if that is "correct"
